title.native: 悪役令嬢なのでラスボスを飼ってみました
title.romaji: Akuyaku Reijou nano de Last Boss wo Kattemimashita
title.english: I'm the Villainess, So I'm Taming the Final Boss

description:
Aileen Lauren d’Autriche’s wedding plans have been suddenly canceled— by her own fiancé! The shock of this jolted her into remembering she’s been reincarnated in an otome game as the villainess. As she recalls, her fate is one of doom, but maybe she can avoid it by marrying the final boss, the Demon King Claude. Her new game plan— seduce the Demon King and live happily ever after.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: 作为恶役大小姐就该养魔王

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/25mai1102)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NagaseSarasa)
Married to [Nobuyoshi Habara](https://anilist.co/staff/115631/).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ihara0423)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/moco2346) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/momokomakiuchi.bsky.social)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ihara0423)

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.
[Souncloud](https://soundcloud.com/user-34206661-417587115)

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.
[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/natsumi-tabuchi)

__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Website](https://taka8rie.com/) | [Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=236) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/taka8rie/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/taka8rie) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/riery_syame/) | [YouTube](https://m.youtube.com/channel/UC9xUIUtv3pyt_s_LtCLWP_Q) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rie_Takahashi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E6%A9%8B%E6%9D%8E%E4%BE%9D)

A voice actress and singer. She won a Best Female Newcomer Award at the 10th Seiyuu Awards in 2016.

She is part of the idol group [Earphones](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) with fellow voice actresses [Marika Kouno](https://anilist.co/staff/119383) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non anime roles:**
- [Hu Tao](https://anilist.co/character/233425/) - Genshin Impact (Video Game)
- [Hikari](https://anilist.co/character/3966/Hikari) - Pokémon Masters EX (Video Game)
- Benten - Soul Tide (Video Game)
- Huma - Tower of Fantasy (Video Game)
- Diesel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (Video Game)
- Erina - Persona 5 Tactica (Video Game)
- Ren - Date a Live: Ren Dystopia (Video Game)
- Kokona - Strinova (Video Game)
- Perfumer - Arknights (Video Game)

A new generation artist "ACCAMER" who goes back and forth between 2D and 3D with a powerful singing voice. With the charm of that singing voice, she made her debut as an artist after being selected as the opening theme song for the TV anime "LISTENERS"
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nvansistine) | [Official Website](https://www.nvansistine.com/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/emilyneves)

Emily Marie Neves is an American voice actress, ADR director and script writer known for her work on English adaptations of Japanese anime shows and films associated with Funimation and Sentai Filmworks/Seraphim Digital. In 2005, she was a preliminary contestant for the fourth season of American Idol at the Las Vegas auditions, where she advanced to the Hollywood round and was eliminated. She was a resident actress at the Alley Theatre in Houston. She was previously married to fellow anime voice actor [Andrew Love](https://anilist.co/staff/96848/Andrew-Love) and was roommates with [Maxey Whitehead](https://anilist.co/staff/103722/Maxey-Whitehead) in college.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/morganlaure) | [Website](http://www.morganlaure.com/)

An American film actress, voice actress and director.

Jad is an American voice actress and ADR director who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. Her name is an acronym of her parents' names, Jimmy and David, and is pronounced as Jade. Her singing led to her first voice role in Sasami: Magical Girls Club as Eimi Mori, and her first major voice role was Masako Hara in Ghost Hunt. She graduated summa cum laude from Texas Wesleyan University with a Bachelor of Arts in Music in 2005.

(Source: Wikipedia)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/macyyyanne) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/macyyyanne/)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/bruno_casemiro/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bruno_casemiro) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/bruno.casemiro)

Bruno Casemiro is an Brazilian actor, voice actor, commercial announcer and producer active in the São Paulo region. He gained prominence after winning the Quero Ser Dublador (translated to "I Want to be a Voice Actor") contest held by the DuBrasil studio.
Julio César Bernal Cataneo is a Mexican voice actor.
